languages.text: "Веабос-6 всегда был миром-тюрьмой, но это... Даже местные мерзавцы не заслуживают подобной участи".
"Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."
languages.original_text: "Веабос-6 всегда был миром-тюрьмой, но это... Даже местные мерзавцы не заслуживают подобной участи".

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos-VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."

languages.text: “维博斯六号星一直都是个刑罚世界，但这……哪怕是被流放到这里的恶棍，也不该落得这样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."

traits.locale_text: “维博斯六号星一直都是个刑罚世界，但这……哪怕是被流放到这里的恶棍，也不该落得这样的下场。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Vheabos VI siempre ha sido un mundo penal, pero esto... Ni siquiera los malhechores de este lugar merecen un destino así».
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."

traits.locale_text: «Vheabos-VI siempre ha sido un mundo penal, pero esto... Ni siquiera los malhechores de este lugar merecen un destino así».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「ヴィアボス・VIは常に流刑惑星だったがこれは…たとえ悪党であったとしても、このような末路にはふさわしくなかろう」
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴェアボスVIは常に流刑惑星だったがこれは…たとえ悪党であったとしても、このような末路にはふさわしくなかろう」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vheabos VI war stets eine Strafwelt, aber das ... nicht einmal die Schurken dieses Ortes verdienen ein solches Schicksal."
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."

traits.locale_text: "Vheabos-VI war stets eine Strafwelt, aber das ... nicht einmal die Schurken dieses Ortes verdienen ein solches Schicksal."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Vhéabos-VI a toujours été un monde pénal, mais là... Même les pires mécréants ne méritent pas ça. »
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."

traits.locale_text: « Vhéabos-VI a toujours été un monde pénal, mais là... Même les pires mécréants ne méritent pas ça. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Vheabos VI, daima bir ceza dünyası olmuştur ama bu... Buradaki bu imansızlar bile böyle bir kaderi hak etmiyorlar."
languages.original_text: "Vheabos VI always was a penal world, but this... even the miscreants of this place do not deserve such a fate."
